mn35:5.4: yathā ca me → yathāssa me (bj, pts1ed)
mn35:5.8: vālaṃ → thālaṃ (sya-all, mr) | nipphoṭeyya → nicchodeyya (bj); nippoṭheyya (sya-all, km); nicchādeyya (pts1ed, mr); nicchoṭeyya (mr)
mn35:16.6: tissaṃ vedanāyaṃ → tāyaṃ vedanāyaṃ (bj); tāya vedanāya (sya-all, pts1ed)
mn35:23.9: vipphanditāni tānipi sabbāni → vipphanditāni kānici kānici tāni (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn35:24.2: () → (mukharosi tvaṃ dummukha) (bj, sya-all, km) | āgamehi tvaṃ, dummukha → etthantare pāṭho si potthake
